replies.body: You don't want to nerf Graves?

> You don't want to nerf Graves?



The joke went over your head
Graves nerfs are not a laughing matter.
Graves needs a new passive that makes you unable to ban him
"whichever team bans graves loses at the start of the game. Player that screamed he'll play Graves first gets 400% more LP, 287,17256% more BP and a wet kiss from CT"
His presence in the game will be Destiny
I would say that this isn't the Meme & Games, but at this point the gameplay of this game has become a meme itself.

Why do people think hes crazy overpowered? In plat+ hes got a 51.4% win rate, that's not exactly CRAZY OP NERF NOW status. He's got a minor nerf on PBE which will probably lower his winrate to 50% or so. That's all he needs tbh.

Kennen mid has a 52.4% winrate. Obviously this means hes much more op than Graves and needs a hotfix immediately. Actually just shut down the servers until hes nerfed, if Graves is at 51% and Kennen is at 52% hes probably so strong its warping the mechanics of the game and creating massive black holes in the code when hes played.
